page.title: 16MID-SUSSEX EDUCATION (1)
page.content: At{Great Walstead}there are about 320 pupils,240 of them are boys and there are 80 girls.There are 159 day pupils. It is a Christian school with a lot of Christian staff.The aim is to get you through the Commmon Entrance exam which is taken at 13+ except for some girls take who take their exam at 11 or 12. It is best to come at about 7-8 unless you have already done some French. You can also take Scholarships.The main subjects for Common Entrance are ENGLISH,FRENCH MATHS,SCRIPTURE,HISTORY,GEOGRAPHY, LATIN AND SCIENCE.There are about 17 to each form with a ratio of 11 pupils to 1 member of staff. Overseas pupils can come since Gatwick airport is very near. Music is encouraged and there is a CHOIR,an ORCHESTRA,and a BAND.There are visiting and resident teachers for most common instruments.
